remarks: Lemma for ~ frege72 .  Proposition 71 of [Frege1879] p. 59. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
frege71 $p |- ( ( A. z ( x R z -> z e. A ) -> ( x R y -> y e. A ) ) -> ( R hereditary A -> ( x e. A -> ( x R y -> y e. A ) ) ) ) $.
